sentences.cn: k将您的看法以电子邮件形式发送至sport@times.co.uk。

sentences.en: For users having IP address, dial account and email account, the system can account the total fee together.
sentences.cn: 对于既有IP地址, 又有拨号帐号、EMAIL帐号的用户, 系统可以对用户的各种费用统一计算、统一管理.

sentences.en: If you have any ideal, please email me.
sentences.cn: 如果你有任何想法, 请发email给我.

sentences.en: It's Interesting to read your email.
It’s usually best to contact him by email.
sentences.cn: 一般最好是用电子邮件和他联络。

sentences.en: Please email the documents to me.
sentences.cn: 请把那些文件以电子邮件形式发给我.

sentences.en: Please email us to be removed from our active list of blood donors.
sentences.cn: 假如你想把自己的名字从献血联系人名单中删去，请给我们发电子邮件。

sentences.en: Send them an email—it's a lot less hassle than phoning.
sentences.cn: 给他们发个电邮吧，这比打电话省事多了。

sentences.en: Soon! I get asked this question every day by email.
sentences.cn: 马上! 我每天都能从email上收到这个问题.

sentences.en: to send a message by email
We have been keeping in touch with each other by email since he left China.
sentences.cn: 他离开中国以后,我们用email保持联系.

sentences.en: Yebo Craig. Thanks for the email.
sentences.cn: 你好，克雷格。谢谢你的电邮。

sentences.en: You can check your email with a click of your mouse.
sentences.cn: 鼠标轻轻一点，即可查看电子邮件。

sentences.en: You can contact me at my email address , at 87645218.
sentences.cn: 您可以发email给我,也可以拔找电话87645218与我联系.

sentences.en: You can send me an email.
sentences.cn: 你可以给我发一份电子邮件.

trans.tran_en: a system that allows you to send and receive messages by computer
a system that allows you to send and receive messages by computer
